------=_NextPart_001_001C_01C69464.230D1C20

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Here is two more.. LOL.. I need to motivate myself to make the web page. bl=
ahh

Any way.  There was this one Grave that we believed was Elizabeths.  W=
e went over there 3 times and could smell lilacs after awhile.  It wasn't i=
mmediate, it just slowly came upon us. There was nothing around us to creat=
e that odor (not even in the woods), so I'm guessing they were sending it t=
o us. When I say "what are these" I was picking up some of those purple flo=
wers that grow from clover.  They did not produce the scent we were smellin=
g!! It was incredible.  I have experienced this before and to me, it means =
close to the same thing as roses.  A welcoming, of love and peace.


  ----=
- Original Message ----- 
  From: Jody Cupp 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com =

  Sent: Tuesday, June 20, 2006 11:54 AM
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] from my o=
hio investigation



  I guess with 3 mediums around it really boosted the =
energy.  I appreciate the compliment. I'm going to put the rest on a web pa=
ge and post the link because it'd be hard to explain each one.  I'll send t=
he loudest evp, I've ever received, before I get that done.

  We had just =
gotten to the grave yard and I immediately heard voices in the woods to the=
 right of the cemetary.  I went right over there and I could feel them all =
coming out of the woods.  I could see mists of blue, gray, and green.  My f=
riend L was walking up to me and talking about how her emf went off immedia=
tely when she got out of the car. You will hear her voice in the begining a=
t a distance then a male voice says "My brother turned it on" and if you li=
sten closely to the end you will hear "I did".

    ----- Original Message =
----- 
    From: Misty Dawn 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Tue=
sday, June 20, 2006 11:40 AM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] from my ohio invest=
igation



    Now I know I heard my name LOL (it's gettin all misty)

    =
I can hear that evp that comes after pretty good but I cant tell whats said=
 besides oh yeah either. You had some really clear ones on that investigati=
on. Good job.

    Misty

    Jody Cupp <bigrig309@...> wrote:
      I =
went to Ohio this weekend and got quite a few evps at Elizabeths grave.  Th=
is one sounds like my Grand father.  You will hear me say.. Do you see that=
 mist over there then he says "oh yeah, yeah" a woman then says something, =
then I ask my husband "was that you or your stomache?" he says "what"  Beca=
use I heard him talking!! But knew it wasn't bri.. I got 58 mins of this st=
uff to go through lol.. But this one is cool because he interacted with me,=
 I heard it, but didn't understand it.




--------------------------------=

Messenger to make PC-to-Phone calls. Great rates starting at 1=A2/min.
